pages.text: Fa'anjaynahu Wa 'Ashaba As-Safinati Wa Ja`alnaha 'Ayatan Lil`alamina
Wa 'Ibrahima 'Idh Qala Liqawmihi A`budu Allaha Wa Attaquhu Dhalikum Khayrun Lakum 'In Kuntum Ta`lamuna

Innama Ta`buduna Min Duni Allahi 'Awthanaan Wa Takhluquna 'Ifkaan 'Inna Al-Ladhina Ta`buduna Min Duni Allahi La Yamlikuna Lakum Rizqaan Fabtaghu `Inda Allahi Ar-Rizqa Wa A`buduhu Wa Ashkuru Lahu 'Ilayhi Turja`una
Wa 'In Tukadhibu Faqad Kadhaba 'Umamun Min Qablikum Wa Ma `Ala Ar-Rasuli 'Illa Al-Balaghu Al-Mubinu
Awalam Yaraw Kayfa Yubdi'u Allahu Al-Khalqa Thumma Yu`iduhu 'Inna Dhalika `Ala Allahi Yasirun
Qul Siru Fi Al-'Arđi Fanzuru Kayfa Bada'a Al-Khalqa Thumma Allahu Yunshi'u An-Nash'ata Al-'Akhirata 'Inna Allaha `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Yu`adhibu Man Yasha'u Wa Yarhamu Man Yasha'u Wa 'Ilayhi Tuqlabuna
Wa Ma 'Antum Bimu`jizina Fi Al-'Arđi Wa La Fi As-Sama'i Wa Ma Lakum Min Duni Allahi Min Wa Liyin Wa La Nasirin
Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Allahi Wa Liqa'ihi 'Ula'ika Ya'isu Min Rahmati Wa 'Ula'ika Lahum `Adhabun 'Alimun
